EmailTemplate.subject: Deliver the Self-Service Experience Your Customers Want with NCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The retail landscape is changing rapidly, and customers want the choice to have a total self-service experience in your store. What does this retail revolution mean for your store design, queue management, colleagues and customers? How can new technologies help minimize stock loss and improve margins? If you’re thinking about implementing self-checkout, make sure you have a game plan.
